caption.p: Expansion in light availability conditions occupied by P. cespitosum in its introduced range. (A) Box plots (10th, 25th, 50th, 75th and 90th percentile) and means (dark line) for light availability at canopy height (% available PAR) at five populations representing P. cespitosum's ecological range in northeastern North America in 1994 and 2009. (B) The percentage of microsites by light availability in 1994 and 2009. Data from both sampling dates were pooled.
